title: Are Family Vloggers EXPLOITING Their Kids?
description:
Family channels are the titans of YouTube in 2021, but are they guilty of exploiting their biggest asset... their own children? Join us fools as we talk about the current status of family channels online, whether they should be regulated, and what our opinions are. And as always, we spill 3 big listener secrets on air.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
